options.content:
# Hinweise

- Durch nachträgliche Importe und Speicherung der Daten kann es im Vergleich mit anderen Stichtags-Erhebungen (z.B. den Berichten der Medienforschungen) Abweichungen bei den Daten geben.
- Für alle seit Mitte Dezember 2023 veröffentlichten Posts auf Instagram gilt: Die Interaktionen enthalten nun auch Shares - für alle Post-Typen (vorher nur für Reels verfügbar). Dadurch sind die Summen der Interaktionen gestiegen, ein direkter Vergleich mit Zeiträumen vor Dezember 2023 ist daher für Gesamtsummen von Interaktionen nicht möglich.
- Die Wiedergabedauer liegt erst ab dem Bericht August 2024 als eingefrorener Wert vor. Für die Monate davor wurden nachträglich Daten importiert, durch den längeren Nutzungszeitraum können die Werte höher ausfallen als die ab August 2024 monatlich gespeicherten Daten.

targets.rawSql:
DECLARE profiles STRING;
SET profiles = ("$queryInteractions");
EXECUTE IMMEDIATE format("""WITH all_data AS(
SELECT DATE(jahr,monat,1) as month_year, REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'🍀',''),'ß','ss') as profile,
IFNULL(interactions,0) as engagedUsers 
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND 
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN jahr = $Jahr AND monat <= 12
ELSE monat <= 12 AND DATE(jahr,monat,1) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1) END
ORDER BY month_year ASC),
max_date AS(
SELECT MAX(month_year) as max_datum FROM all_data
),
top_8_profiles_current_month AS(
SELECT profile FROM all_data
WHERE month_year = (SELECT max_datum FROM max_date)
ORDER BY engagedUsers DESC
LIMIT 8
), top_8_profiles AS(
SELECT * FROM all_data
WHERE profile IN (SELECT profile FROM top_8_profiles_current_month)),
rest AS(
SELECT month_year, "Rest" as profile, SUM(engagedUsers) as engagedUsers
FROM all_data
WHERE profile NOT IN (SELECT profile FROM top_8_profiles_current_month)
GROUP BY month_year)
SELECT * FROM(
SELECT * FROM top_8_profiles
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM rest
WHERE CASE
WHEN profile = "Rest" THEN engagedUsers IS NOT NULL 
ELSE TRUE END
ORDER BY month_year, profile)
PIVOT (
  SUM(engagedUsers) FOR profile IN (%s)
)
ORDER BY DATE(month_year) ASC
""", profiles);

WITH top_8_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, interactions as engagedUsers
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
ORDER BY engagedUsers DESC
LIMIT 8
), rest AS(
  SELECT "Rest" as profile, SUM(interactions) as engagedUsers
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
AND profile NOT IN (SELECT profile FROM top_8_profiles)
)
SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'🍀',''),'ß','ss') as profile,
engagedUsers FROM(
SELECT profile, IFNULL(engagedUsers,0) as engagedUsers FROM top_8_profiles
UNION ALL
SELECT profile, engagedUsers FROM rest
WHERE CASE
WHEN profile = "Rest" THEN engagedUsers IS NOT NULL 
ELSE TRUE END)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Summe')), 'Summe')
FROM(
SELECT 'Summe' as Gesamt
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Ø Pro Tag')), 'Ø Pro Tag')
FROM(
SELECT 'Ø Pro Tag' as Gesamt
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(Gesamt)), Gesamt)
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " ", $Jahr) as Gesamt
)

SELECT
SUM(interactions)/1000000 as Interaktionen,
(SUM(interactions)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as InteraktionenProTag
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(Gesamt)), Gesamt)
FROM(
SELECT CASE $month_as_number
            WHEN 19 THEN ""
            ELSE "$LastMonat_abkuerzung $YearFromLastMonth"
            END As Gesamt
)

WITH past_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(interactions)/1000000 as past_sum_in_mil,
  (SUM(interactions)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as past_sum_per_day
  FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $last_month AND jahr = $year_from_last_month 
), current_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(interactions)/1000000 as current_sum_in_mil,
  (SUM(interactions)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as current_sum_per_day
  FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr
)
SELECT (current_sum_in_mil/past_sum_in_mil - 1)*100 as diff_mil, (current_sum_per_day/past_sum_per_day - 1)*100 as diff_per_day FROM past_value_in_mil, current_value_in_mil

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(Gesamt)), Gesamt)
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " ", $LastJahr) as Gesamt
)

WITH past_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(interactions)/1000000 as past_sum_in_mil,
  (SUM(interactions)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as past_sum_per_day
  FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $month_from_last_year AND jahr = $last_year 
), current_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(interactions)/1000000 as current_sum_in_mil,
  (SUM(interactions)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as current_sum_per_day
  FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr
)
SELECT (current_sum_in_mil/past_sum_in_mil - 1)*100 as diff_mil, (current_sum_per_day/past_sum_per_day - 1)*100 as diff_per_day FROM past_value_in_mil, current_value_in_mil

DECLARE profiles STRING;
SET profiles = ("$queryVideoviews");
EXECUTE IMMEDIATE format("""WITH all_data AS(
SELECT DATE(jahr,monat,1) as month_year, REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'🍀',''),'ß','ss') as profile,
IFNULL(videostarts,0) as videoViews 
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND 
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN jahr = $Jahr AND monat <= 12
ELSE monat <= 12 AND DATE(jahr,monat,1) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1) END
ORDER BY month_year ASC),
max_date AS(
SELECT MAX(month_year) as max_datum FROM all_data
),
top_8_profiles_current_month AS(
SELECT profile FROM all_data
WHERE month_year = (SELECT max_datum FROM max_date)
ORDER BY videoViews DESC
LIMIT 8
), top_8_profiles AS(
SELECT * FROM all_data
WHERE profile IN (SELECT profile FROM top_8_profiles_current_month)),
rest AS(
SELECT month_year, "Rest" as profile, SUM(videoViews) as videoViews
FROM all_data
WHERE profile NOT IN (SELECT profile FROM top_8_profiles_current_month)
GROUP BY month_year)
SELECT * FROM(
SELECT * FROM top_8_profiles
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM rest
WHERE CASE
WHEN profile = "Rest" THEN videoViews IS NOT NULL
ELSE TRUE END
ORDER BY month_year, profile)
PIVOT (
  SUM(videoViews) FOR profile IN (%s)
)
ORDER BY DATE(month_year) ASC
""", profiles);

WITH top_8_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, videostarts as videoViews
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
ORDER BY videoViews DESC
LIMIT 8
), rest AS(
  SELECT "Rest" as profile, SUM(videostarts) as videoViews
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
AND profile NOT IN (SELECT profile FROM top_8_profiles)
)
SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'🍀',''),'ß','ss') as profile,
videoViews FROM(
SELECT profile, IFNULL(videoViews,0) as videoViews FROM top_8_profiles
UNION ALL
SELECT profile, videoViews FROM rest
WHERE CASE
WHEN profile = "Rest" THEN videoViews IS NOT NULL 
ELSE TRUE END)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Summe')), 'Summe')
FROM(
SELECT 'Summe' as Gesamt
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Ø Pro Tag')), 'Ø Pro Tag')
FROM(
SELECT 'Ø Pro Tag' as Gesamt
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(Gesamt)), Gesamt)
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " ", $Jahr) as Gesamt
)

SELECT
SUM(videostarts)/1000000 as Videostarts,
(SUM(videostarts)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as VideostartsProTag
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(Gesamt)), Gesamt)
FROM(
SELECT CASE $month_as_number
            WHEN 19 THEN ""
            ELSE "$LastMonat_abkuerzung $YearFromLastMonth"
            END As Gesamt
)

WITH past_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(videostarts)/1000000 as past_sum_in_mil,
  (SUM(videostarts)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as past_sum_per_day
  FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $last_month AND jahr = $year_from_last_month 
), current_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(videostarts)/1000000 as current_sum_in_mil,
  (SUM(videostarts)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as current_sum_per_day
  FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr
)
SELECT (current_sum_in_mil/past_sum_in_mil - 1)*100 as diff_mil, (current_sum_per_day/past_sum_per_day - 1)*100 as diff_per_day FROM past_value_in_mil, current_value_in_mil

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(Gesamt)), Gesamt)
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " ", $LastJahr) as Gesamt
)

WITH past_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(videostarts)/1000000 as past_sum_in_mil,
  (SUM(videostarts)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as past_sum_per_day
  FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $month_from_last_year AND jahr = $last_year 
), current_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(videostarts)/1000000 as current_sum_in_mil,
  (SUM(videostarts)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as current_sum_per_day
  FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr
)
SELECT (current_sum_in_mil/past_sum_in_mil - 1)*100 as diff_mil, (current_sum_per_day/past_sum_per_day - 1)*100 as diff_per_day FROM past_value_in_mil, current_value_in_mil

DECLARE profiles STRING;
SET profiles = ("$queryPotReichweite");
EXECUTE IMMEDIATE format("""WITH all_data AS(
SELECT DATE(jahr,monat,1) as month_year, REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'🍀',''),'ß','ss') as profile, IFNULL(pot_reichweite_pro_tag,0) as impressionsUnique FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND 
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN jahr = $Jahr AND monat <= 12
ELSE monat <= 12 AND DATE(jahr,monat,1) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1) END
ORDER BY month_year ASC),
max_date AS(
SELECT MAX(month_year) as max_datum FROM all_data
),
top_8_profiles_current_month AS(
SELECT profile FROM all_data
WHERE month_year = (SELECT max_datum FROM max_date)
ORDER BY impressionsUnique DESC
LIMIT 8
), top_8_profiles AS(
SELECT * FROM all_data
WHERE profile IN (SELECT profile FROM top_8_profiles_current_month)),
rest AS(
SELECT month_year, "Rest" as profile, SUM(impressionsUnique) as impressionsUnique
FROM all_data
WHERE profile NOT IN (SELECT profile FROM top_8_profiles_current_month)
GROUP BY month_year)
SELECT * FROM(
SELECT * FROM top_8_profiles
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM rest
WHERE CASE
WHEN profile = "Rest" THEN impressionsUnique IS NOT NULL
ELSE TRUE END
ORDER BY month_year, profile)
PIVOT (
  SUM(impressionsUnique) FOR profile IN (%s)
)
ORDER BY DATE(month_year) ASC
""", profiles);

WITH top_8_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, pot_reichweite_pro_tag as impressionsUnique
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
ORDER BY pot_reichweite_pro_tag DESC
LIMIT 8
), rest AS(
  SELECT "Rest" as profile, SUM(pot_reichweite_pro_tag) as impressionsUnique
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
AND profile NOT IN (SELECT profile FROM top_8_profiles)
)
SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'🍀',''),'ß','ss') as profile,
impressionsUnique FROM(
SELECT profile, IFNULL(impressionsUnique,0) as impressionsUnique FROM top_8_profiles
UNION ALL
SELECT profile, impressionsUnique FROM rest
WHERE CASE WHEN profile = "Rest" THEN impressionsUnique IS NOT NULL 
ELSE TRUE END)

WITH all_profiles AS(
    SELECT profile, instagramID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND instagramID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), all_data AS(
  SELECT 
profile, profileId, followers
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile, IFNULL(followers,0) as followers FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_data
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY followers DESC, profile ASC

WITH all_profiles AS(
    SELECT profile, instagramID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND instagramID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), all_data AS(
  SELECT 
lm.profile,
profileId,
lm_follower,
IFNULL((lm_follower/llm_follower - 1)*100,0) as FollowerVeraenderung
FROM
(
SELECT
profile, profileId, followers as lm_follower
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
ORDER BY followers desc
) as lm
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT
profile, followers as llm_follower
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE 
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN monat = $month_from_last_year AND jahr = $last_year
ELSE monat = $last_month AND jahr = $year_from_last_month END
AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
ORDER BY followers desc
) as llm 
ON llm.profile = lm.profile
ORDER BY lm.lm_follower DESC
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile as Profil, IFNULL(FollowerVeraenderung,0) as FollowerVeraenderung FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_data
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY lm_follower DESC, profile ASC

WITH all_profiles AS(
    SELECT profile, instagramID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND instagramID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), all_data AS(
  SELECT 
profile, profileId, interactions
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile, IFNULL(interactions,0) as interactions FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_data
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY interactions DESC, profile ASC

WITH all_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, instagramID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND instagramID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), all_data AS(
SELECT profile, profileId,
post_reels as type_1_count,
post_carousels as type_2_count,
post_images as type_3_count,
post_videos as type_4_count,
anzahlPosts, interactions
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile as Profil, IFNULL(type_1_count,0) as type_1_count, 
IFNULL(type_2_count,0) as type_2_count, IFNULL(type_3_count,0) as type_3_count, IFNULL(type_4_count,0) as type_4_count, IFNULL(anzahlPosts,0) as anzahlPosts FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_data
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY interactions DESC, profile ASC

WITH all_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, instagramID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND instagramID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), all_data AS(
  SELECT
profile, profileId, pot_reichweite_pro_tag
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile, IFNULL(pot_reichweite_pro_tag,0) as interactions FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_data
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY pot_reichweite_pro_tag DESC, profile ASC

WITH all_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, instagramID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND instagramID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), all_data AS(
  SELECT 
lm.Profil as profile,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(lm_reach,llm_reach) - 1)*100 as FollowerVeraenderung,
lm_reach
FROM
(
SELECT
profile as Profil, pot_reichweite_pro_tag as lm_reach
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
ORDER BY pot_reichweite_pro_tag desc) as lm

LEFT JOIN
(
  SELECT
profile as Profil, pot_reichweite_pro_tag as llm_reach
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN monat = $month_from_last_year AND jahr = $last_year
ELSE monat = $last_month AND jahr = $year_from_last_month END AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
ORDER BY pot_reichweite_pro_tag desc
) as llm
ON llm.Profil = lm.Profil
ORDER BY lm_reach DESC
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile as Profil, IFNULL(FollowerVeraenderung,0) as FollowerVeraenderung FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_data
USING(profile)
ORDER BY lm_reach DESC, profile ASC

WITH all_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, instagramID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND instagramID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), all_data AS(
  SELECT
profile, profileId, pot_reichweite_pro_post
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile, IFNULL(pot_reichweite_pro_post,0) as interactions FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_data
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY pot_reichweite_pro_post DESC, profile ASC

WITH all_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, instagramID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND instagramID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), all_data AS(
SELECT profile, profileId,
post_reels as type_1_count,
post_carousels as type_2_count,
post_images as type_3_count,
post_videos as type_4_count,
anzahlPosts, pot_reichweite_pro_post
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile as Profil, IFNULL(type_1_count,0) as type_1_count, 
IFNULL(type_2_count,0) as type_2_count, IFNULL(type_3_count,0) as type_3_count, IFNULL(type_4_count,0) as type_4_count, IFNULL(anzahlPosts,0) as anzahlPosts FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_data
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY pot_reichweite_pro_post DESC, profile ASC

WITH all_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, instagramID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND instagramID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), all_data AS(
  SELECT
profile, profileId, pot_reichweite_pro_story
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile, IFNULL(pot_reichweite_pro_story,0) as interactions FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_data
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY pot_reichweite_pro_story DESC, profile ASC

WITH all_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, instagramID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND instagramID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), all_data AS(
SELECT profile,
profileId,
story_images as type_3_count,
story_videos as type_4_count,
anzahlStory,
pot_reichweite_pro_story
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile as Profil, IFNULL(type_3_count,0) as type_3_count, IFNULL(type_4_count,0) as type_4_count, IFNULL(anzahlStory,0) as anzahlStory FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_data
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY pot_reichweite_pro_story DESC, profile ASC

WITH all_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, instagramID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND instagramID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), all_data AS(
  SELECT
profile, profileId, videostarts
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile, IFNULL(videostarts,0) as videostarts FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_data
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY videostarts DESC, profile ASC

WITH all_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, instagramID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND instagramID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), all_data AS(
  SELECT profile,
  profileId,
post_reels + post_videos as anzahlPosts, videostarts
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile, IFNULL(anzahlPosts,0) as anzahlPosts FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_data
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY videostarts DESC, profile ASC

WITH all_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, instagramID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND instagramID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), all_data AS(
  SELECT
profile, profileId, sehVolumen
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile, IFNULL(sehVolumen,0) as sehVolumen FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_data
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY sehVolumen DESC, profile ASC

options.content: Legende:  🖼️ = Foto    🎠 = Karussell    🎥 = Video    🎞️ = Reel

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  profile,
  time,
  videoViews,
  reach,
  type,
  link,
  post as Post,
  Interaktionen 
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_top_posts_nach_interaktionen
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
ORDER BY Interaktionen DESC LIMIT 100

options.content: Legende:  🖼️ = Foto    🎠 = Karussell    🎥 = Video    🎞️ = Reel

targets.rawSql:
SELECT DISTINCT
profile,
  time,
  videoViews,
  reach,
  type,
  link,
  Post,
  Interaktionen 
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_top_one_post_je_profil
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
ORDER BY Interaktionen DESC

SELECT
profile,
 createTime,
 Thumbnail,
  message,
  link,
  type,
  reach,
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_top_story_elemente_nach_pot_reichweite
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
ORDER BY reach DESC limit 100

SELECT
profile,
 createTime,
 Thumbnail,
  message,
  link,
  type,
  reach,
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_top_story_elemente_nach_pot_reichweite
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
ORDER BY reach DESC limit 100

WITH all_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, instagramID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND instagramID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), current_values AS(
SELECT profile, followers as current_followers, anzahlPosts as current_anzahlPosts, interactions as current_interactions, pot_reichweite_pro_tag as current_pot_reichweite_pro_tag, pot_reichweite_pro_post as current_pot_reichweite_pro_post,
pot_reichweite_pro_story as current_pot_reichweite_pro_story, videostarts as current_videostarts, sehVolumen as current_sehVolumen
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"),
past_values AS(
SELECT profile, followers as past_followers, anzahlPosts as past_anzahlPosts, interactions as past_interactions, pot_reichweite_pro_tag as past_pot_reichweite_pro_tag, pot_reichweite_pro_post as past_pot_reichweite_pro_post,
pot_reichweite_pro_story as past_pot_reichweite_pro_story, videostarts as past_videostarts, sehVolumen as past_sehVolumen
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN monat = $month_from_last_year AND jahr = $last_year
ELSE monat = $last_month AND jahr = $year_from_last_month END
AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
), joined_data AS(
SELECT * FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN
current_values
USING(profile)
LEFT JOIN 
past_values
USING(profile))
SELECT profile as Profil,
CASE current_followers
WHEN 0 THEN NULL
ELSE current_followers END as followers,
CASE current_followers - past_followers
WHEN 0 THEN NULL
ELSE current_followers - past_followers END as FollowerVeraenderungAbsolut,
CASE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_followers,past_followers)-1)*100 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL
ELSE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_followers,past_followers)-1)*100 END as FollowerVeraenderung,

CASE current_anzahlPosts
WHEN 0 THEN NULL
ELSE current_anzahlPosts END as Anzahlposts,

CASE current_interactions 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL 
ELSE current_interactions END as Interaktionen,
CASE current_interactions - past_interactions 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL 
ELSE current_interactions - past_interactions END as InteraktionenVeraenderungAbsolut,
CASE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_interactions,past_interactions)-1)*100 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL 
ELSE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_interactions,past_interactions)-1)*100 END as InteraktionenVeraenderung,

CASE current_pot_reichweite_pro_tag 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL 
ELSE current_pot_reichweite_pro_tag END as PotenzielleReichweite,
CASE current_pot_reichweite_pro_tag - past_pot_reichweite_pro_tag 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL 
ELSE current_pot_reichweite_pro_tag - past_pot_reichweite_pro_tag END as PotenzielleReichweiteVeraenderungAbsolut,
CASE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_pot_reichweite_pro_tag,past_pot_reichweite_pro_tag)-1)*100 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL 
ELSE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_pot_reichweite_pro_tag,past_pot_reichweite_pro_tag)-1)*100 END as PotenzielleReichweiteVeraenderung,

CASE current_pot_reichweite_pro_post 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL 
ELSE current_pot_reichweite_pro_post END as PotenzielleReichweiteProPost,
CASE current_pot_reichweite_pro_post - past_pot_reichweite_pro_post 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL 
ELSE current_pot_reichweite_pro_post - past_pot_reichweite_pro_post END as PotenzielleReichweiteProPostVeraenderungAbsolut,
CASE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_pot_reichweite_pro_post,past_pot_reichweite_pro_post)-1)*100 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL 
ELSE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_pot_reichweite_pro_post,past_pot_reichweite_pro_post)-1)*100 END as PotenzielleReichweiteProPostVeraenderung,

CASE current_pot_reichweite_pro_story 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL 
ELSE current_pot_reichweite_pro_story END as PotenzielleReichweiteProStory,
CASE current_pot_reichweite_pro_story - past_pot_reichweite_pro_story 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL 
ELSE current_pot_reichweite_pro_story - past_pot_reichweite_pro_story END as PotenzielleReichweiteProStoryVeraenderungAbsolut,
CASE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_pot_reichweite_pro_story,past_pot_reichweite_pro_story)-1)*100 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL 
ELSE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_pot_reichweite_pro_story,past_pot_reichweite_pro_story)-1)*100 END as PotenzielleReichweiteProStoryVeraenderung,

CASE current_videostarts 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL 
ELSE current_videostarts END as Videostarts,
CASE current_videostarts - past_videostarts 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL 
ELSE current_videostarts - past_videostarts END as VideostartsVeraenderungAbsolut,
CASE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_videostarts,past_videostarts)-1)*100 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL 
ELSE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_videostarts,past_videostarts)-1)*100 END as VideostartsVeraenderung,

CASE current_sehVolumen 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL 
ELSE current_sehVolumen END as Wiedergabedauer,
CASE current_sehVolumen - past_sehVolumen 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL 
ELSE current_sehVolumen - past_sehVolumen END as WiedergabedauerVeraenderungAbsolut,
CASE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_sehVolumen,past_sehVolumen)-1)*100 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL 
ELSE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_sehVolumen,past_sehVolumen)-1)*100 END as WiedergabedauerVeraenderung,

FROM joined_data
ORDER BY Profil DESC

query.rawSql:
SELECT a.LRA
FROM (
SELECT "MDR" as LRA
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT "NDR"
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT "KiKA"
UNION DISTINCT 
SELECT "Radio Bremen"
) as a
ORDER BY (
  CASE
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(LOWER("${__user.email}"), LOWER(a.LRA))
    THEN 1
    ELSE 0
  END
) DESC

WITH months AS (
  SELECT 'Januar' AS month_name, 1 AS month_value, DATE($Jahr,02,08) AS min_date
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Februar', 2, DATE($Jahr,03,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'März', 3, DATE($Jahr,04,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'April', 4, DATE($Jahr,05,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Mai', 5, DATE($Jahr,06,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Juni', 6, DATE($Jahr,07,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Juli', 7, DATE($Jahr,08,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'August', 8, DATE($Jahr,09,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'September', 9, DATE($Jahr,10,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Oktober', 10, DATE($Jahr,11,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'November', 11, DATE($Jahr,12,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Dezember', 12, DATE($Jahr+1,01,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Jahr', 19, DATE($Jahr+1,01,08)
)
SELECT month_name
FROM months
WHERE CURRENT_DATE >= min_date
ORDER BY
CASE
WHEN month_value = (SELECT MAX(month_value) FROM months WHERE CURRENT_DATE() >= min_date AND month_value <= 12) AND $Jahr = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE) THEN 0
ELSE 1 END, month_value ASC

WITH alle_jahre AS(
SELECT DISTINCT jahr
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE jahr > 2021)
 
SELECT CAST(jahr AS STRING)
FROM alle_jahre
ORDER BY
CASE
WHEN jahr = (SELECT MAX(jahr) FROM alle_jahre WHERE CURRENT_DATE() >= DATE(jahr || '-02-08')) THEN 0
ELSE 1 END, jahr DESC

SELECT
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 1 THEN "Januar"
WHEN 2 THEN "Februar"
WHEN 3 THEN "März"
WHEN 4 THEN "April"
WHEN 5 THEN "Mai"
WHEN 6 THEN "Juni"
WHEN 7 THEN "Juli"
WHEN 8 THEN "August"
WHEN 9 THEN "September"
WHEN 10 THEN "Oktober"
WHEN 11 THEN "November"
WHEN 12 THEN "Dezember"
WHEN 19 THEN "Jahr"
END

SELECT
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 1 THEN "Jan."
WHEN 2 THEN "Feb."
WHEN 3 THEN "März"
WHEN 4 THEN "Apr."
WHEN 5 THEN "Mai"
WHEN 6 THEN "Juni"
WHEN 7 THEN "Juli"
WHEN 8 THEN "Aug."
WHEN 9 THEN "Sep."
WHEN 10 THEN "Okt."
WHEN 11 THEN "Nov."
WHEN 12 THEN "Dez."
END

SELECT
CASE EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
WHEN 1 THEN "Jan."
WHEN 2 THEN "Feb."
WHEN 3 THEN "März"
WHEN 4 THEN "Apr."
WHEN 5 THEN "Mai"
WHEN 6 THEN "Juni"
WHEN 7 THEN "Juli"
WHEN 8 THEN "Aug."
WHEN 9 THEN "Sep."
WHEN 10 THEN "Okt."
WHEN 11 THEN "Nov."
WHEN 12 THEN "Dez."
END
SELECT CAST($Jahr - 1 AS STRING)
SELECT CAST(EXTRACT(YEAR from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1),INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AS STRING)

current.text: EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = 2 AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = 2025
current.value: EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = 2 AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = 2025

query.rawSql:
SELECT 
    CASE "${Monat:text}"
    WHEN "Jahr" THEN "EXTRACT(YEAR FROM time) = $Jahr"
    ELSE "EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $month_as_number AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr"
    END

SELECT CAST(zeitraum as STRING) FROM(
SELECT CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN 12
ELSE $month_as_number END AS zeitraum)

WITH max_time AS (SELECT MAX(time) as time FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
            WHERE $Zeitraum AND page_follows IS not null)
SELECT CONCAT(EXTRACT(DAY FROM time),".", EXTRACT(MONTH FROM time),".", EXTRACT(YEAR FROM time)) FROM max_time

SELECT CASE "${Monat:text}"
      WHEN "Jahr" THEN "Vorjahr"
      ELSE "Vormonat "
      END
    as month_year

SELECT
CASE 
WHEN ($month_as_number = 19 AND DATE($Jahr+1, 1, 7) > CURRENT_DATE()) THEN FORMAT_DATE('%d.%m.%Y', CURRENT_DATE())
WHEN $month_as_number = 19 THEN CONCAT("07.01.",CAST($Jahr+1 AS STRING))
WHEN DATE_ADD(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,7), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) > CURRENT_DATE() THEN FORMAT_DATE('%d.%m.%Y', CURRENT_DATE())
ELSE 
CASE $month_as_number
  WHEN 12 THEN FORMAT_DATE('%d.%m.%Y',DATE($Jahr+1,01,07))--FORMAT_DATE('%d.%m.%Y',PARSE_DATE('%d.%m.%Y', CONCAT('07.01.', CAST($Jahr + 1 AS STRING))))
  ELSE FORMAT_DATE('%d.%m.%Y',DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number+1,07))
 --FORMAT_DATE('%d.%m.%Y',PARSE_DATE('%d.%m.%Y', CONCAT('07.', LPAD(CAST($month_as_number + 1 AS STRING), 2, '0'), '.', CAST($Jahr AS STRING))))
END END
--WHEN 12 THEN CONCAT("07.01.",CAST($Jahr+1 AS STRING))
--ELSE CONCAT("07.", CAST($month_as_number+1 AS STRING), ".$Jahr") END END

SELECT
CASE
WHEN $month_as_number = 19 AND CURRENT_DATE() < DATE($Jahr + 1, 1, 7) THEN ""
WHEN $Jahr < 2022 THEN ""
WHEN $month_as_number = 19 AND CURRENT_DATE() > DATE($Jahr, 1, 7) THEN CONCAT("_final_",CAST($Jahr AS STRING))
WHEN CURRENT_DATE() < DATE_ADD(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,8),INTERVAL 1 MONTH) THEN ""
WHEN LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1)) <= DATE(2023,11,30) THEN ""
ELSE CONCAT("_final_",CAST($Jahr AS STRING),"_", CAST($month_as_number AS STRING)) END

SELECT
CASE
WHEN $month_as_number = 19 AND CURRENT_DATE() < DATE($Jahr + 1, 1, 7) THEN ""
WHEN $Jahr < 2021 THEN ""
WHEN $month_as_number = 19 AND CURRENT_DATE() > DATE($Jahr, 1, 7) THEN "_frozen"
WHEN CURRENT_DATE() < DATE_ADD(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,8),INTERVAL 1 MONTH) THEN ""
WHEN LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1)) <= DATE(2023,12,31) THEN "_frozen"
ELSE "_frozen" END

SELECT CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN CAST(0 AS STRING)
ELSE CAST(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $month_as_number, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AS STRING) END
SELECT CAST(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $month_as_number, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AS STRING)
SELECT CAST($month_as_number AS STRING)
SELECT CAST($Jahr-1 AS STRING)

WITH all_data AS(
SELECT DATE(jahr,monat,1) as month_year, REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'🍀',''),'ß','ss') as profile,
interactions as engagedUsers 
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND 
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN jahr = $Jahr AND monat != 19
ELSE monat <=12  AND DATE(jahr,monat,1) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1) END
ORDER BY month_year ASC),
max_date AS(
SELECT MAX(month_year) as max_datum FROM all_data
),
top_8_profiles_current_month AS(
SELECT profile FROM all_data
WHERE month_year = (SELECT max_datum FROM max_date)
ORDER BY engagedUsers DESC
LIMIT 8
),
rest AS(
SELECT CASE
WHEN engagedUsers IS NOT NULL THEN profile
ELSE NULL END as profile FROM (
SELECT month_year, "Rest" as profile, SUM(engagedUsers) as engagedUsers
FROM all_data
WHERE profile NOT IN (SELECT profile FROM top_8_profiles_current_month)
GROUP BY month_year)),
top_8_profiles_and_rest AS(
SELECT profile FROM top_8_profiles_current_month
UNION ALL
SELECT profile FROM rest)
SELECT STRING_AGG(DISTINCT CONCAT("'", profile, "'"), ', ') FROM top_8_profiles_and_rest

WITH all_data AS(
SELECT DATE(jahr,monat,1) as month_year, REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'🍀',''),'ß','ss') as profile,
videostarts as videoViews 
FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND 
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN jahr = $Jahr AND monat != 19
ELSE monat <= 12 AND DATE(jahr,monat,1) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1) END
ORDER BY month_year ASC),
max_date AS(
SELECT MAX(month_year) as max_datum FROM all_data
),
top_8_profiles_current_month AS(
SELECT profile FROM all_data
WHERE month_year = (SELECT max_datum FROM max_date)
ORDER BY videoViews DESC
LIMIT 8
), rest AS(
  SELECT CASE
  WHEN videoViews IS NOT NULL THEN profile 
  ELSE NULL END as profile FROM(
SELECT month_year, "Rest" as profile, SUM(videoViews) as videoViews
FROM all_data
WHERE profile NOT IN (SELECT profile FROM top_8_profiles_current_month)
GROUP BY month_year)), top_8_profiles_and_rest AS(
SELECT profile FROM top_8_profiles_current_month
UNION ALL
SELECT profile FROM rest)
SELECT STRING_AGG(DISTINCT CONCAT("'", profile, "'"), ', ') FROM top_8_profiles_and_rest

WITH all_data AS(
SELECT DATE(jahr,monat,1) as month_year, REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'🍀',''),'ß','ss') as profile, pot_reichweite_pro_tag as impressionsUnique FROM Quintly_frozen.instagram_metrics
WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND 
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN jahr = $Jahr AND monat != 19
ELSE monat <= 12 AND DATE(jahr,monat,1) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1) END
ORDER BY month_year ASC),
max_date AS(
SELECT MAX(month_year) as max_datum FROM all_data
),
top_8_profiles_current_month AS(
SELECT profile FROM all_data
WHERE month_year = (SELECT max_datum FROM max_date)
ORDER BY impressionsUnique DESC
LIMIT 8
), rest AS(
  SELECT CASE
  WHEN impressionsUnique IS NOT NULL THEN profile
  ELSE NULL END as profile FROM(
SELECT month_year, "Rest" as profile, SUM(impressionsUnique) as impressionsUnique
FROM all_data
WHERE profile NOT IN (SELECT profile FROM top_8_profiles_current_month)
GROUP BY month_year)), top_8_profiles_and_rest AS(
SELECT profile FROM top_8_profiles_current_month
UNION ALL
SELECT profile FROM rest)
SELECT STRING_AGG(DISTINCT CONCAT("'", profile, "'"), ', ') FROM top_8_profiles_and_rest

SELECT CASE $month_as_number
            WHEN 19 THEN "##"
            ELSE "## $LastMonat_abkuerzung  \n ## $YearFromLastMonth"
            END

SELECT CAST(number AS STRING) FROM (
SELECT
CASE "$Monat"
WHEN "Januar" THEN 1
WHEN "Februar" THEN 2
WHEN "März" THEN 3
WHEN "April" THEN 4
WHEN "Mai" THEN 5
WHEN "Juni" THEN 6
WHEN "Juli" THEN 7
WHEN "August" THEN 8
WHEN "September" THEN 9
WHEN "Oktober" THEN 10
WHEN "November" THEN 11
WHEN "Dezember" THEN 12
WHEN "Jahr" THEN 19
END as number)

SELECT CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "KiKA" THEN "KiKa"
ELSE "$LRA" END

WITH nutzer AS (
  SELECT
CASE
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.login}", "dev") THEN "dev"
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.login}", "mefo") THEN "mefo"
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "@") THEN
      REGEXP_EXTRACT("${__user.email}", r'@([^\.]+)')  -- Extracts part after '@' and before the first '.' Example: ad.westphal@ndr.de => ndr
    WHEN NOT CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "@")
         AND (CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "viewer") 
         OR CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "podcast")) THEN
            REGEXP_EXTRACT("${__user.email}", r'^([^-\s]+)')  -- Extracts part before the first '-'. Example: ndr-viewer => ndr
    ELSE
      "Anonym"
  END AS nutzer_lra
),
filter_string AS (
  SELECT """
LRA=${LRA}|::|Monat=${Monat}|::|Jahr=${Jahr}
""" AS filter
)

SELECT CONCAT(
  "https://vqggwrz.pa-cd.com/event?s=645199&idclient=minerva&events=%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22page.display%22%2C%22data%22%3A%7B%22page%22%3A%22",
  "${__dashboard.name}",
  "%22%2C%22m_visits%22%3A1%2C%22minerva_dashboard_id%22%3A%22",
  "${__dashboard.uid}",
  "%22%2C%22minerva_lra%22%3A%22",
  nutzer.nutzer_lra,
  "%22%2C%22minerva_filter%22%3A%22",
  filter_string.filter,
  "%22%7D%7D%5D"
) AS event_url
FROM nutzer, filter_string
